alert.note: Alert for York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:18PM EDT until July 29 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cabarrus County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Eastern Lincoln County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Southeastern Cleveland County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Gaston County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern York County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 817 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Huntersville to 9 miles southeast of Shelby, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and pea to dime size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters and Doppler radar. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Gastonia, Rock Hill, Charlotte, Huntersville, and Downtown Concord. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
